item.title: Examples of Storage Backend Configuration Files in Typical Scenarios
item.description: For details about the backend configuration in typical scenarios, see the following examples. For details about the parameter configuration, see Storage Backend Parameters. item.title: Storage Backend Parameters
item.description: An example template of the backend configuration file is /examples/backend/backend.yaml. The following table lists the parameters. Table 1 backend parameters Parameter Description Mandatory Default Value Remarks storage Storage service type. If enterprise storage provides SAN, set this parameter to oceanstor-san.If enterprise storage provides NAS, set this parameter to oceanstor-nas.If enterprise storage provides NAS of the Dtree type, set this parameter to oceanstor-dtree.If distributed storage provides SAN, set this parameter to fusionstorage-san.
